roleset.name: make the characteristic noise of a cow

example.name: low-v: Bovine
example.text: The cattle lowed in the field .

roleset.note: LOW-V NOTES: Frames file for 'low' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry 38. (from low.01-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: be depressed, in poor spirits
roleset.note: LOW-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, comparison to high.02. (from low.02-j)

roleset.name: be unrefined, base, immoral

example.name: low-j: empty it, concatenation
example.text: Some men thought that even if Wes 's accusations against Old Bill were true , it was low of him to make them after all these years .

propbank.arg: to make them after all these years

roleset.note: LOW-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet, FrameNet. (from low.03-j)

roleset.name: have a location towards the bottom of a framework

role.descr: the lower portion of what, domain

example.name: low-j: both args
example.text: It is low in altitude compared to the rest of the mountain , being only 1200 m above sea level .
example.amr: (l / low-04 :ARG1 (i2 / it) :ARG2 (a / altitude) :ARG1-of (c / compare-01 :ARG2 (r / rest :part-of (m / mountain))) :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01 :ARG0 (a2 / above-01 :ARG1 i2 :ARG2 (l2 / level :mod (s / sea)) :quant (d / distance-quantity :quant 1200 :unit (m2 / meter)) :mod (o / only))))

propbank.arg: compared to the rest of the mountain
being only 1200 m above sea level

example.name: low-j: both args
example.text: Feinberg et al . [ 27 ] found that raising and lowering the pitch of female voices by 20 Hz had a stronger effect on voices that were low in pitch before being manipulated than on voices that were average - pitched or high - pitched before manipulation .
example.amr: (f / find-01 :ARG0 (a / and :op1 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Feinberg")) :op2 (p2 / person :pl + :ARG1-of (o / other-01 :ARG2 p))) :ARG1 (a2 / affect-01 :ARG0 (a3 / and :op1 (r / raise-01 :ARG1 (t / thing :ARG2-of (p3 / pitch-02 :ARG1 (v / voice :mod (f2 / female)))) :ARG2 (f3 / frequency-quantity :quant 20 :unit (h / herz))) :op2 (l / lower-05 :ARG1 t :ARG2 f3)) :ARG1 (v2 / voice :pl + :ARG1-of (i2 / include-91 :ARG2 v) :ARG1-of (l2 / low-04 :ARG2 (p4 / pitch-02) :time (b / before :op1 (m2 / manipulate-01 :ARG1 v2)))) :ARG1-of (h2 / have-degree-91 :ARG2 (s / strong-02) :ARG3 (m / more) :ARG4 (a4 / affect-01 :ARG0 a3 :ARG1 (v3 / voice :pl + :ARG1-of (i3 / include-91 :ARG2 v) :ARG1-of (p5 / pitch-02 :ARG2 (o2 / or :op1 (t3 / thing :ARG1-of (a5 / average-01)) :op2 (t4 / thing :ARG1-of (h3 / high-02))) :time (b2 / before :op1 (m3 / manipulate-01 :ARG1 v3))))))))

example.name: low-j: both args
example.text: The water level is low for a June measurement

roleset.note: LOW NOTES: Updated for SpatialAMR. Args 4-6 added.
LOW-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, comparison to high.01. Corresponds somewhat to lower-v.01. (from low.01-j)
LOWER-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from lower.01-j)

roleset.name: cause to go down, esp of financial usage, decreasing

role.descr: Logical subject, patient, thing going down
end point, end state of arg1

example.name: lower-v: just transitive
example.text: The upgrade reflected the 20 % decline in shares of the bank since the firm lowered its rating in early October , based on the belief the stock had become expensive .

propbank.arg: based on the belief the stock had become expensive

example.amr: (r / reflect-01 :ARG1 (u / upgrade-02) :ARG2 (d / decline-01 :ARG1 (s / share-01 :pl + :ARG1 (b / bank)) :time (a / after :op1 (l / lower-01 :ARG0 (f / firm) :ARG1 (r2 / rate-01 :ARG0 f :ARG1 b) :time (e / early :op1 (d2 / date-entity :month 11)) :ARG1-of (b2 / base-02 :ARG0 f :ARG2 (b3 / believe-01 :ARG1 (b4 / become-01 :ARG1 (s2 / stock) :ARG2 (e2 / expensive))))))))

example.name: lower-v: start and end points
example.text: Standard & Poor 's Corp. lowered the rating on Crossland 's preferred stock to double - C from single - B - minus and placed it on CreditWatch for possible further downgrade .

propbank.arg: the rating on Crossland 's preferred stock

example.amr: (a / and :op1 (l / lower-01 :ARG0 (c / company :name (n / name :op1 "Standard" :op2 " &" :op3 "Poor's" :op4 "Corp.")) :ARG1 (r / rate-01 :ARG0 c :ARG1 (s / stock :ARG1-of (p / prefer-01) :mod (c2 / company :name (n2 / name :op1 "Crossland"))) :ARG3 (s2 / string-entity :value "B-") :ARG4 (s3 / string-entity :value "CC"))) :op2 (p2 / place-01 :ARG0 c :ARG1 s :ARG2 (p3 / program :name (n3 / name :op1 "CreditWatch")) :purpose (p4 / possible-01 :ARG1 (d / downgrade-02 :ARG1 s :degree (f / further)))))

example.name: lower-v: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: According to this plan , it was decided that Britain would use a dam in Uganda in order to lower the water level in the White Nile by seven - eighths .

propbank.arg: the water level in the White Nile

example.amr: (s / say-01 :ARG0 (p / plan-01 :mod (t / this)) :ARG1 (d / decide-01 :ARG1 (u / use-01 :ARG0 (c / country :wiki "United_Kingdom" :name (n / name :op1 "Britain")) :ARG1 (d2 / dam :location (c2 / country :wiki "Uganda" :name (n2 / name :op1 "Uganda"))) :ARG2 (l / lower-01 :ARG0 c :ARG1 (l2 / level :mod (w / water) :location (r / river :name (n3 / name :op1 "White" :op2 "Nile"))) :ARG2 (d3 / distance-quantity :quant "7/8")))))

example.name: lower-v: With Causer
example.text: Statins also lower LDL , and so people assume that the benefit of statins is due to their lowering of LDL .
example.amr: (l / lower-01 :ARG0 (p2 / product :wiki "Statin" :name "Statin") :ARG1 (p / protein :wiki "Low-density_lipoprotein" :name (n / name :op1 "LDL")) :mod (a / also) :ARG0-of (c / cause-01 :ARG1 (a2 / assume-01 :ARG0 (p3 / person :pl +) :ARG1 (c2 / cause-01 :ARG0 l :ARG1 (b / benefit-01 :ARG0 p2)))))

roleset.note: LOWER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'lower' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Comparison with 'drop' and similar verbs of incremental downward movement. (from lower.01-v predicate notes)
